title: Graduate Student
description: Began Master's in Computer Science, focusing on AI/ML, mobile development, and cloud computing. Started my journey in the U.S. as an international student.

title: Discovering Photography
description: Picked up photography as a hobby, capturing moments from my travels and daily life. Started sharing my work on Instagram, documenting my journey through the lens.

title: Student Ambassador
description: Represented the university and helped incoming students navigate their academic journey. Built connections and community while sharing my experiences.

title: Exploring California
description: Traveled across California, from the tech hubs of Silicon Valley to the scenic coastlines. Photography became a way to document these adventures and share stories.

title: Student Proctor / Supervisor
description: Supervised academic activities and ensured smooth operations of university programs. Developed leadership skills while balancing studies and personal interests.

title: History Enthusiast
description: Deepened my passion for history, reading extensively about world events, cultures, and the stories that shaped our world. Combined this with travel to visit historical sites.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Mentored 30+ graduate students in Mobile Application Development, built auto-graders, and redesigned assignments aligned with industry patterns. Found joy in teaching and helping others grow.

title: Dog Lover & Photographer
description: Developed a special love for dogs and started photographing these wonderful companions. Captured their personalities and the joy they bring, sharing these moments with others.

title: Research Assistant ‚Üí Lead SWE
description: Promoted to Lead SWE, developing YouDescribeX for AI accessibility. Leading cross-functional teams and delivering production-ready features. Balancing impactful work with personal growth.

title: Agentic AI Engineer Intern ‚Üí Lead
description: Promoted to Lead - Data & Compliance Squad. Deployed AI agents reducing manual effort by 40% and achieving 99.9% uptime. Continued learning and growing both professionally and personally.

title: Building My Portfolio
description: Created this portfolio website to showcase my work, journey, and passions. Combining my technical skills with my love for photography, travel, and storytelling.
